name: Cupcake Dessert Pastry Bakery Maker Dash - candy food cooking game!
name_original: Cupcake Dessert Pastry Bakery Maker Dash - candy food cooking game!
description:
Do you have what it takes to run this Cupcake Shop?

Make cupcake desserts quickly or your customers will get angry and leave your store!!

Have soooo much fun!
